Tiger Woods and Rory McIlroy have teamed up to spearhead a new PGA Tour 'stadium' competition, according to reports.

articles.author: Daniel Matthews
articles.title: William Saliba is the toast of Arsenal: Fans' favourite is showing his class after biding his time - Daily Mail
articles.description: It is a new addition to the Arsenal jukebox. A catchy one, too. Not much poetry to it - certainly no mention of souls or totem poles. Just the Gunners' take on an old classic: Tequila is now Saliba.
articles.content:
By half-time on the south coast, the soundtrack to this Saturday evening had been on loop for around 10 minutes.
